title: The History of soccer
creator_credit: WPE, Jamie Baker and Stewart Binns
brief_description: The definitive, all-encompassing documentary on the international history of the most popular sport in the world. This film goes back to the roots of football and traces its remarkable growth across the world. The story of the people’s game begins 2,000 years ago. All the major civilisations around the world have a record of soccer as part of their culture, with the oldest and most complete records found in China. This video features 3 hours of history and fantastic World Cup action.
